summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3567, for the improvement of 17th Avenue Northeast, from East 45th Street to East 55th Street; all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 44085 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
